message: This is my second time facing Toue in Rhyme.
It was a different field last time, though. This one must be Toue's true field.
It's dark and eerie, but also kind of beautiful, in a mysterious way...
I lost last time, but this time...
I feel power coursing through my body.
Two figures appear in front of me. One is Toue. The other is...

name: 蓮
message: "It appears that Usui is Toue's Allmate. That must be its true form."

name: 東江
message: "Now, shall we begin? The first move is yours."
Toue's smile is casual, calm. The sight of it fans the flames of my rage.
Do I really stand a chance?
Ren's tone is confident, matching the light in his eyes.
...He's right. As long as we're together, we have nothing to fear.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh! Not gonna be that easy, huh?"

name: 東江
message: "Usui was based on Sei, you know. They have the same face. Can't you tell?"

name: 東江
message: "Sei and Aoba―twins chosen by fate. Sei, as his name suggests, governs life. And you, born without breath, govern death."

name: 東江
message: "One with the power to create. One with the power to destroy. Two halves of one whole."

name: 東江
message: "Sei spent much of his life in a coma as I plumbed the secrets of his mind."

name: 東江
message: "Over time, he developed a powerful desire for freedom. His consciousness expanded beyond the confines of his body."

name: 東江
message: "He gained the ability to split off pieces of himself and send them out into the world."

name: 東江
message: "Riding the electromagnetic waves that permeate our society, these pieces of Sei spread through the net, worming their way into places you wouldn't believe."

name: 東江
message: "There wasn't much they could actually do, I'm afraid. But they could, if they accessed the right device, send out a message."
To me? Has Sei ever sent me a message?

name: 東江
message: "Meanwhile, we used this new power of Sei's to empower our brainwashing dolls. Usui was the first. And that's how Rhyme was born."

name: 東江
message: "But for each piece that was split off, his true self, the one housed in his body, grew weaker."

name: 東江
message: "In a sense, Usui is a second Sei."

name: 東江
message: "Oh, Aoba. You really ought to have realized by now."

name: 東江
message: "The moment you resolved to win, you accepted the possibility of defeat."

name: 東江
message: "What would you say is the most sublime state a human can reach?"

name: 東江
message: "Emptiness. Only in the absence of emotion and desire can human beings truly find peace."

name: 東江
message: "Desire fuels strife. By eliminating desire, therefore, I will give humanity true peace. True happiness. Does this make me evil?"

name: 東江
message: "Is the world you live in truly so much better? A world of unchecked greed and conflict, where people die for no reason at all?"

name: 東江
message: "You are death. Your power is destruction. Will you now kill the pieces of Sei, who wanted only to be free?"
...My power can only destroy. He's not wrong.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Destroying someone doesn't have to mean killing them."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It can free them, too! An end to allow for a new beginning. From death can come new life!"

name: 東江
message: "If that is what you believe, then come. Your death, my life. Show me which is stronger."

name: 東江
message: "Perhaps you'll grant me freedom as well. Heh heh heh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit! You're not gonna be able to handle another of those!"

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba. I know this might sound strange coming from me..."

name: 蓮
message: "But if Usui contains a piece of Sei, then maybe you can get through to him."

name: 蓮
message: "This is Rhyme. Our minds are closer here. Call to Sei, like you called to me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Don't worry... I'll destroy you. I'll set you free. That's what my power's for."
